reviews.title: Positive
reviews.review_text: Great Phone and at an amazing price, Verizon sells this same prepaid phone for $185, Walmart has it listed for under $80, same exact phone with Verizon Service for less than half the price.

reviews.title: So far so good
reviews.review_text: I had to search for a case for it online. Seems to be a good phone although it is a little slow to react to touch...this might be solved through settings..patience is a virtue right...

reviews.title: Good price for a basic phone
reviews.review_text: Good price for a Samsung A02s phone. It's no longer on store shelves but still provide the same features as the lower end available for double of the price in the stores. Satisfies our needs of phone calls, texts, email, internet searches and photos. Arrived much faster than promised.

reviews.title: Good phone
reviews.review_text: This is the second one ive purchased. First one 4-5 years ago. Was time for new one. Knew exactly what i wanted

reviews.title: Only get if you already have Verizon prepaid.
reviews.review_text: It's a nice phone and better than the A01. I ended using it as a emergency car phone in my glove box. I was trying to get the phone unlocked so I can use it on my carrier that uses Verizon towers. It took about 3 hrs tossed and around from person to person to find out it could not work. I even lost service because the first representative said it would help the unlocking process. The last representative said that I agreed to it so I can not get the service back. I also do not like that Verizon prepaid holds the phone hostage until you pay for the first month. That means you can not test the phone out on wifi. I was going to return the phone but the Walmart app said I could not. The only good thing about Verizon prepaid is if a natural Disaster happens they give a free month of service in that area. So now it just emergency phone that can also call 911 because of the voice over lte is happening now.

reviews.title: NO EASY MODE FOR SENIORS
reviews.review_text: NO EASY MODE. NO EASY MODE. Purchased for a senior as her first smartphone. I've had to find workarounds for this missing feature. I am a bit annoyed that I had to discover this deficit. My A51 has the Easy Mode option. It is a really stupid design failure and was my main reason for buying a Samsung.

reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
reviews.review_text: What I dislike is that I ordered this phone less than 2 mo. ago and after an automatic update on 06/29/2021, I can't make or receive calls or messages. My sim and network is no longer recognized. Also just found out that I can't return the phone for a refund or replacement to Walmart because the cut off time for refund was 06/15/2021. Google search revealed that this particular phone does indeed tend to have glitches after updates....will definitely be following up with corporate about this.

I purchased this on the Black Friday deal I paid the 40$ activation but now it's just loading and keeps saying error that they can't activate the phone but they already have my money and currently calling support just listening to hold music I have a feeling it's about to get returned and my money back!!!!!!!

reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
reviews.review_text: DO NOT BUY PLEASE DO NOT BUY...This has got to be the worst phone i have ever owned, SLOWER THEN CHILLED MOLASSES. If i could give it zero stars i would. My old J3 was twice the phone this pile of junk is...13mp camera is a total lie, More like 3mp, takes forever to send or receive any files or photo's. Get over a mile from the cell tower and you might get 1 bar...No wonder this pile of trash is always on sale....BUYER BEWARE.

reviews.title: DON'T BUY
reviews.review_text: All was good was happy with the phone couldn't complain then after 2 or so months of using it I updated it and then after the update I was listing items online to sell and in the middle of taking pictures and uploading them to the web my phone freezes up and then crashes now it won't power on or do anything I can't even recharge it the screen just stays dark.
